Sentencas: EtOH recovery = 80%, V = 0.7 V, fuel utilization = 80%, T-SOFC = 1200 K) yields Q(Cmin) = 73.4 and Q(Hmin) = 0 kW To enhance the performance of SOFC-DIS, utilization of internal useful heat sources from within the system (e.g. condenser duty and hot water from the bottom of the distillation column) and a cathode recirculation have been considered in this study.

Sentencas: The utilization of condenser duty for preheating the incoming bioethanol and cathode recirculation for SOFC-DIS system were chosen and implemented to the SOFC-DIS (CondBio-CathRec).
